!Adventurers' Guide Miss Queen: Welcome! I've been dispatched from the Adventurer's Guild to guide characters new to the world of Lineage II. In celebration of the arrival of a new era, the guild has temporarily opened its weapons warehouse to adventurers in training and travelers that have reached level 6 and completed their first occupation change. If you meet these requirements, I'll give you a weapon exchange coupon and permit you to rent the weapon of your choice from the Adventurer's Guild weapons warehouse. Bear in mind, this coupon is only valid until you reach level 25. Are you ready to choose your weapon? (Any character with a PK count of 1 or above is not eligible to receive the coupon.) [npc_%objectId%_Quest|- Yes, I Want this weapon.]
